price: Mararfannaa Nu biraa ta’eefi qulqullinas (isaaf kenninee jirra). Inni (Rabbiin) sodaataa ta’eera.
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
